Nerfboy, please edit your posts and not 6xPosting in a row. And I just added the Azure Kite which can go faster than 600m/s.

Also, try to at least capitalize 'I', it just gets confusing to read what you posted when it's all lowercase and most words are misspelled.

@nerfboy621: I would consider most of your posts as spam, so please edit them into meaningful sayings. Here at Gold Stingray we want customer satisfaction, and a forum thread filled with useless spam is not good for Gold Stingray.

To answer your question:Sorry, applications are closed at the moment because our CEO is on vacation, so please be patient. However, when he comes back, you can apply.

Thanks!

Plaatinum Aerospace
